verses.verse: To the chief Musician <WH5329> <WH8764> upon Mahalath <WH4257>, Maschil <WH4905> <WH8688>, A Psalm of David <WH1732>. The fool <WH5036> hath said <WH559> <WH8804> in his heart <WH3820>, There is no 'Elohim <WH430>. Corrupt <WH7843> <WH8689> are they, and have done abominable <WH8581> <WH8689> iniquity <WH5766>: there is none that doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> good <WH2896>.

'Elohim <WH430> looked down <WH8259> <WH8689> from heaven <WH8064> upon the children <WH1121> of men <WH120>, to see <WH7200> <WH8800> if there were <WH3426> any that did understand <WH7919> <WH8688>, that did seek <WH1875> <WH8802> 'Elohim <WH430>.
Havahry one of them is gone back <WH5472> <WH8804>: they are altogether <WH3162> become filthy <WH444> <WH8738>; there is none that doeth <WH6213> <WH8802> good <WH2896>, no, not one <WH259>.

Have the workers <WH6466> <WH8802> of iniquity <WH205> no knowledge <WH3045> <WH8804>? who eat up <WH398> <WH8802> my people <WH5971> as they eat <WH398> <WH8804> bread <WH3899>: they have not called <WH7121> <WH8804> upon 'Elohim <WH430>.

There were they in great <WH6343> fear <WH6342> <WH8804>, where no fear <WH6343> was: for 'Elohim <WH430> hath scattered <WH6340> <WH8765> the bones <WH6106> of him that encampeth <WH2583> <WH8802> against thee: thou hast put them to shame <WH954> <WH8689>, because 'Elohim <WH430> hath despised <WH3988> <WH8804> them.

Oh that <WH5414> <WH8799> the salvation <WH3444> of Yisra'EL <WH3478> were come out of TZiyon <WH6726> ! When 'Elohim <WH430> bringeth back <WH7725> <WH8800> the captivity <WH7622> of his people <WH5971>, Ya`akov <WH3290> shall rejoice <WH1523> <WH8799>, and Yisra'EL <WH3478> shall be glad <WH8055> <WH8799>.
